formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \text{Category} = \begin{cases} \text{Hypertensive Crisis} & \text{if } S > 180 \text{ or } D > 120 \\ \text{High BP (Stage 2)} & \text{if } S \ge 140 \text{ or } D \ge 90 \\ \text{High BP (Stage 1)} & \text{if } (130 \le S \le 139) \text{ or } (80 \le D \le 89) \\ \text{Elevated} & \text{if } (120 \le S \le 129) \text{ and } D < 80 \\ \text{Normal} & \text{if } S < 120 \text{ and } D < 80 \end{cases}
